scripts.deploy: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls deploy
scripts.remove: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls remove
scripts.test-create-list: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls invoke local --function create-access-list --path test/access_list.json
scripts.test-delete-list: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls invoke local --function delete-access-list --path test/delete-access-list.json
scripts.test-update-list: aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls invoke local --function update-access-list --path test/update-access-list.json
scripts.test-list: cd api && aws-okta exec nonprod -- npx sls invoke local --env DYNAMODB_TABLE='nsg-acl-storage-nonprod' --function list
